title: Boosthub
description: Platform to offer blockchain courses and  mentoring services related to development

long-description.front-end: This project has been fully developed using React with Javascript. Application is fully responsive.
long-description.back-end: The back-end has been developed using Node.js with Typescript.
long-description.database: The database used is Postgres. For local development, I used Docker to run the database and the back-end. For deployment, I used a Dokku app to create the database.
long-description.deployment: The application is deployed in a personal VPS with Ubuntu distribution. I used Dokku as orchestration tool and CloudFare as CDN. The domain is managed by CloudFare.
long-description.blockchain: The application uses Ethers.js to interact with the Arbitrum blockchain. The application permits minting a  NFT certifacte in the blockchain when a course is finished.

title: Fast ticket
description: Application to share the ticket of a restaurant/bar easily between several people

long-description.front-end: This project has been developed using React with Typescript. Application is designed to be used in a mobile phone.
long-description.back-end: The back-end has been developed using Python, specifically Fast-API. The backed used an API for an enterprise called Mindee which performs an OCR to the restaurant receipts.
long-description.database: The database used is Postgres. I used a Dokku app to create the database.
long-description.deployment: The application is deployed in a personal VPS with Ubuntu distribution. I used Dokku as orchestration tool and CloudFare as CDN. The domain is managed by CloudFare.

title: Food ranking
description: Application to rank food depending on my personal criteria.

long-description.front-end: This project has been developed using React with Typescript. The application is fully responsive.
long-description.back-end: The back-end has been developed using Node.js with Typescript. It is deployed using serverless functions provided by Microsoft Azure.
long-description.database: The database used is Postgres. I used an external provider to get Postgres database services.
long-description.deployment: The front-end is deployed in Netlify platform and the backed in the serverless services provided by Microsoft Azure.
